description:
Heals an ally for 300 HP.
Can only be used outside of battle.
name: Potion

description:
A potion designed to induce strong sexual arousal.
Increases an ally's Lust by 50 and inflicts Aroused.
name: Aphrodisiac

description:
Used by adventurers and those practicing chastity.
Rub on the target's body to reduce their Lust by 50.
name: Calming Lotion

description:
Rub all over a defeated ally's body to restore her to
full HP. Can only be used outside of battle.
name: Restoring Lotion

description:
Said to contain the purity of Saint Urania herself.
Cures Horny, Aroused, and Bimbo when used.
name: Maiden Potion

Cures most mental conditions when used, returning the

description:
Heals an ally for 250 HP.

name: Healing Sap

description:
Restores a defeated ally with 5% HP.
Can only be used outside of battle.
name: Restorative Rose

description:
A stiff, juicy mushroom. Restores all HP when used.
Can be used in battle. Small chance to become Aroused.
name: Turgid Mushroom

description:
A type of Mind Cleanser with some unusual ingredients.
Cures Clown and Giggly when used.
name: Balloon Popper

Tears shed by the Goddess, according to myth.

description:
An erotic book featuring all sorts of scenarios...
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Naughty Book

description:
A special stone used to sharpen weaponry.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Whetstone

description:
An inkpen of the highest quality that never smudges.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Quality Pen

description:
Alchemical pellets said to help induce good dreams.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Dream Capsules

description:
An adorable little accessory.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Cute Ribbon

description:
A pendant that induces a sleepy, enjoyable trance.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Soothing Charm

description:
A relic found in the Tomb of Luxatep.
Drink its seeping nectar to be inflicted with Relic.
name: Cobra Idol

description:
A semi-sentient slime made to multiply itself.
Recharges after using a Restoration Point.
name: Ravenous Blob (Tired)

description:
Cursed object used by Wandering Puppeteers.
Turns the target into a lifeless wooden puppet.
name: Puppet Strings

description:
Coats an ally with slime, then maxes out her Lust.
Can use in or out of battle. Needs to recharge after.
name: Ravenous Blob

description:
A heretofore unknown potion. Can cure girls who have
been transformed into Scarecrows.
name: Straw Admixture

<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 515>

Latex, from the land of Al Sahil, is known for its

A puffy, vividly colored rubber nose that honks.

description:

description:
An egg laid en masse by girls impregnated by Orcs.
Can be sold.
name: Egg

description:
Gets the target pregnant. Extreme caution should be
used when impregnating elves.
name: Orc Semen

description:
A gem capable of holding souls within. Currently empty.
Use on an ally to inflict them with Soulgem.
name: Empty Soulgem

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[1].
It shines with a blue light.
name: Blue Soulgem

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[2].
It shines with an aquamarine light.
name: Aquamarine Soulgem

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[3].
It shines with a yellow light.

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[4].

description:

description:

It shines with a pale blue light.

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[7].
It shines with a pink light.
name: Pink Soulgem

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[8].

description:
You should not have obtained this item. Please report
it to 1d51 in the Odyssey of Gianna Discord.
name: THIS IS A BUG

description:
Grants the skill "Puppeteer," which allows the user
to manipulate puppets.
name: Puppeteer Tome

description:
One of the Six Orbs. However, its true power lies
dormant. Find the Green Tome to unleash its potential.
name: Green Jewel

description:
One of the Six Orbs. However, its true power lies
dormant. Find the Blue Tome to unleash its potential.
name: Blue Jewel

description:
One of the Six Orbs. However, its true power lies
dormant. Find the Yellow Tome to unleash its potential.
name: Yellow Jewel

description:
One of the Six Orbs. However, its true power lies
dormant. Find the Red Tome to unleash its potential.
name: Red Jewel

description:
One of the Six Orbs. However, its true power lies
dormant. Find the White Tome to unleash its potential.
name: White Jewel

description:
One of the Six Orbs. However, its true power lies
dormant. Find the Black Tome to unleash its potential.
name: Black Jewel

description:
One of the Six Tomes. It can awaken the power of the
Green Jewel to create the Green Orb.
name: Green Tome

description:
One of the Six Tomes. It can awaken the power of the
Blue Jewel to create the Blue Orb.
name: Blue Tome

description:
One of the Six Tomes. It can awaken the power of the
Yellow Jewel to create the Yellow Orb.
name: Yellow Tome

description:
One of the Six Tomes. It can awaken the power of the
Red Jewel to create the Red Orb.
name: Red Tome

description:
One of the Six Tomes. It can awaken the power of the
White Jewel to create the White Orb.
name: White Tome

description:
One of the Six Tomes. It can awaken the power of the
Black Jewel to create the Black Orb.
name: Black Tome

description: KO's an ally.
name: Death Potion

description:
A small chest bearing a golden fox crest.
Grants a random item when opened.
name: Mystery Box

description:
Turns the target into a Bimbo. You must use a Maiden
Potion to turn her back.
name: Magic Hairdye

description:
Turns the target into a Robot. You can cure her by
speaking to Mai. Stands for "AI Conversion Engine."
name: A.C.E.

description:
Golden sigil with Queen Trinity's insignia. Awarded to
those who defend the realm from evildoers.
name: Queen's Emblem

description:
Grants the skill "Healing Prayer." Less effective than
the Heal spell, but anyone can learn it.
name: Healing Prayer Tome

description:
Turns the target into a Zombie. Curing it requires a

name: Witch's Poppet

description:
Single-use explosive, often used by Dwarves for mining.

description: Feed for cows. Average quality.
name: Cow Feed

description:
Feed for cows. Decent quality, owing to the orcs'
methods for keeping hearty cattle.
name: Tabnath Cow Feed

description:
Feed for cows. Fine quality, owing to West Beach's
demand for high-grade cattle.
name: Western Cow Feed

description:
Feed for cows. Excellent quality, owing to Mt.
Pleasant's expertly cultivated farmland.
name: Mountain Cow Feed

description:
Heals an ally for 150 HP and inflicts Empowered.
Can be used in battle.
name: Power Potion

description:
A cursed cow bell. Inflicts Cow, but if used on a Cow,
cures it instead. Single-use.
name: Cow Bell

description:
Contains ancient Orc magic, still potent even now.
Use to transform an ally into an Orc. Unlimited uses.
name: Ancient Orc Scroll

description:
"I am not me. I am no one. I am nothing."
Turns an ally into a Faceless Maid. Unlimited uses.
name: Faceless Mantra

description:
Recipe for making Potions. Does nothing by itself,
but if you had someone to mix it for you...
name: Potion Recipe

description:
Recipe for making Power Potions. Does nothing by
iself, but if you had someone to mix it for you...
name: Power Potion Recipe

description:
Magic amulet that, combined with certain magics, can
inflict irreversible petrification.
name: Eye of the Gorgon

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of Blackspear Wu'Ka.
It shines with an intense, deep red light.
name: Deep Red Soulgem

description:
Trophy commemorating victory against Kin'Rabia the mage.
Can be sold or put on display.
name: Kin'Rabia Trophy

description:
Trophy commemorating victory against Jai'Kai the slaver.
Can be sold or put on display.
name: Jai'Kai Trophy

description:
Trophy commemorating victory against the Fallen
Knightess. Can be sold or put on display.
name: Knightess Trophy

description:
Trophy commemorating victory against Wu'Ka, the arena's
former champion. Can be sold or put on display.
name: Wu'Ka Trophy

description:
Trophy commemorating victory against Butin'Bak, Queen
of Tabnath. Can be sold or put on display.
name: Butin'Bak Trophy

description: A dark blue slime. It moves slightly...
name: Blue Goop

description:
A wide basket, intended to hold a large plant.
It's wide enough that you could step in it...
name: Planter Basket

description:
Straw symbol that can turn girls to scarecrows.
Can only be used outside the Forest Cabin.
name: Harvest Icon

description:
Triggers a cute & magical transformation. After using,
attunes to its user and can't be used by anyone else.
name: Henshin Wand

description:
A magic wand left with no power.
Go to a Restoration Point to recharge it.
name: Henshin Wand (Spent)

description:
Grants the spells "Thunder," "Trance," "Soulsever,"
and "Revival." Magic users only.
name: Luxatep's Tome

description:
Allows you to read ancient hieroglyphics without an
interpreter.
name: Glyphic Lens

description:
Grants the spell "Soulsever," which turns allies into
Zombies and Soulgems. Magic users only.
name: Soulsever Tome

description:
Condemns an ally into becoming a forgotten hieroglyph
in the Tomb of Luxatep. Unlimited uses.
name: Obelisk Fragment

description:
Functions as an overpowering aphrodisiac for Forestkin.
No effect on other pary members, but sells well.
name: Mandrake Root

description:
Key held by the chief of the Forestkin village
outside Mt. Pleasant.
name: Chief's Key

description:
Disgustingly dirty key found in Mt. Pleasant's
greenhouse.
name: Cumstained Key

description:
Mysterious ticket with all four card suits on it.
Wanted by the Demon Queen. Rip it apart to use it.
name: Gambler's Ticket

description:
Grants the skill "Necromancer," which allows the user
to command zombies. Magic users only.
name: Necromancer Tome

description:
One fifth of a porcelain mask. Hums with energy, but
only while within the City of Mist.
name: Mask Fragment

description:
A small rune-inscribed tablet. Opens pathways normally
restricted by Vemix's approval.
name: Vemix's Unique Rune

description:
A small token, made out of solidified spirit matter
worth 300 gold. Used aboard the Phantom Express.
name: Casino Token

description: A key in the overly fancy Chateau d'Yterre style.
name: Bedroom Key

description: A key in the overly fancy Chateau d'Yterre style.
name: Storage Key

description:
Grants the spell "Deliverance," which deals Light-
element damage to one enemy. Magic users only.
name: Deliverance Tome

description:
Deals minor Wind damage to an ally, then blows her to
the back of the party order. Can only use in battle.
name: Wind in a Jar

description:
Contains the memories of various skilled adventurers.
Use on an ally to have her gain 50 JP in her class.
name: Elixir

description:
Grants the skill "Sculpt," which allows one to shape
Golem's appearances. Non-magic users can learn it.
name: Sculpt Tome

description:
Key to the Mindmill that was worn around the Maester's
neck. No longer useful, but is made of valuable gold.
name: Mindmill Key

description:
Grants the spell "Veil," which inflicts allies with
Unaware in battle. Magic users only.
name: Veil Tome

description:
A mask with nothing but a smile and painted-on cheeks.
Can be used on the field or in battle.
name: Featureless Mask

description:
Key sold by a strange masked shopkeeper.
Opens chests in her shop.
name: Special Key

description:
A phony copy of the Blue Jewel. Despite a crack running
through it, it should still sell well.
name: Fake Blue Jewel

description:
Device that stimulates lactation. Restores all uses of
Milk and Lactate when used. Can be used in battle.
name: Udder Pump

description: Heals an ally for 50 HP. Can be used in battle.
name: Delicious Apple

description:
Heals an ally for 100 HP, but lowers her AGI for 2
turns. Can be used in battle.
name: Fine Wine

description:
Heals an ally for 20 HP and raises her DEF for 2
turns. Can be used in battle.
name: Healthy Greens

description: Heals an ally for 30 HP. Can be used in battle.
name: Aged Cheese

description: Heals an ally for 120 HP. Can be used in battle.
name: Scrumptious Salad

description:
Grants the spell "Morph," which cures most
transformative status conditions. Magic users only.
name: Morph Tome

description:
A dusty key of dark metal. Opens the way to the lady
of Castle Hargrave.
name: Upper Courtyard Key

description:
A mote of pure black. Radiates an aura that's both
scary and giddying at the same time.
name: Drop of Darkness
note:
<Instant>
<Sort Priority: 102>
<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 508>

description: One of many keys to the Lewd Bandits' hideout.
name: Bandit Key

description: Small red pellets. Very sweet. Almost too sweet...
name: Demon's Candy
note:
<Instant>
<Sort Priority: 103>
<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 542>

description: Engraved on it is the name, "Ventura."
name: Sisters' Key

description: A key of completely unknown origin.
name: Unknown Key

An onahole that used to be \N[1].

description:
Though the liquid within it is merely colored water,
this bottle will sell nicely.
name: Bottle of Ambrosia

description:
The last of a legendary vintage from Villa da Vici.
Sells very well, but can also be used for healing.
name: Lussuria Liquida

description:
Completely restores an ally's HP.
Can only be used outside of battle.
name: Lussuria Liquida

description: Painting of a noble from Ilsanya. Sells well.
name: Old Royalty's Portrait

description:
Recipe for making Quick Potions. Does nothing by
itself, but if you had someone to mix it for you...
name: Quick Potion Recipe

description:
A chunk taken off of a destroyed Temple Idol.
Being solid gold, it should sell quite well.
name: Idol Shard

description:
Grants the spell "Fortuna," which turns allies into
enchanted dice blocks. Magic users only.
name: Fortuna Tome

description:
A bottle filled with nonsentient blue slime. Use on
an ally to inflict them with Slimy.
name: Bottle of Slime

description:
An amber jewel that functions as a gargoyle's heart.
Can be sold.
name: Gargoyle Heart

description:
Legendary recipe for making Elixirs. Does nothing by
itself, but if you had someone to mix it for you...
name: Elixir Recipe

description:
Pencil sketch of an adventuring group. Written under 
it: "Lyra, Maritus, Olivia & Amy V., and M."
name: Adventurer's Sketch

name: Blowback Bullet

description: Key to the old Spell Bullet shop in West Beach Outpost.
name: Spell Bullet Shop Key

description:
Allows \N[10] to learn the Self-Improvement skill and
create new Puppet Cores at her workbench.
name: Maharani's Manuscript

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[9].
It shines with a red light.
name: Red Soulgem

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[10].
It shines with an orange light.
name: Orange Soulgem

description:
Key to the Seaside Chalet south of West Beach Outpost,
marking you as its owner.
name: Chalet Key

name: Smug Onahole

description:
Grants the spell "lan," which grants an ally a large
ATK and AGI boost, but inflicts Ignition.
name: lan Tome

An alchemical mixture that counteracts amorphism.

name: Solidifier

Spell Bullet imbued with strings of manipulation.

name: Toy Bullet

description:
A bottle of Nettare Classico wine from Villa da Vici.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Classy Wine

description:
An alcohol-heavy rice wine from the Southern Continent.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Oshiman Sake

description:
High-quality fabric woven in the Great Layered City.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Sahiran Fabric

description:
Not fit for consumption. Can be thrown at an enemy to
deal minor damage and potentially inflict Poison.
name: Atrocious Meal

A suit of latex from Al Sahil that fits any body type.

name: Chocolate Sweets

Mesmerizing hourglass of red sand from the Dreamlands.

name: Red Hourglass

description:
A garland of beautiful flowers, worn around the neck.

name: Seidon Lei

description:
A wine of sophistication. Restores HP based on its
vintage and inflicts Obedient. Can be used in battle.
name: Pura Principessa

description:
A classy fine wine. Restores a number of spell uses
based on its vintage. Can be used in battle.
name: Magia Scorrnte
note:
<Instant>
<Sort Priority: 52>
<Custom SType 1 Limited Uses>
   value += $gameVariables.value(762);
</Custom SType 1 Limited Uses>

description:
A blunt-tasting wine. Restores HP based on its vintage
and applies all Aegis effects. Can be used in battle.
name: Fedele Compagna

description:
A silky smooth wine. Restores HP based on its vintage
and lets the user Vanish. Can be used in battle.
name: Senza Volo

description:
A sparkling wine. Restores HP based on its vintage and
briefly buffs ATK and MAT a lot. Can be used in battle.
name: Bordo Affilato

description:
A near-perfect wine. Greatly restores HP based on its
vintage and lowers Lust by 50. Can be used in battle.
name: Innocenza

description:
An alcohol-laced aphrodisiac. Raises Lust based on
its vintage and buffs PAS. Can be used in battle.
name: Lussuria Liquida Due

description:
Wine of the highest calibre. Restores a percentage of
HP based on its vintage. Can be used in battle.
name: Raffinata Nobilt

description:
A low-class wine. Restores HP based on its vintage and
resores some spell uses. Can be used in battle.
name: Ragazza della Taverna

description:
A spicy wine. Inflicts Puppet, then heals and gives
buffs based on its vintage. Can be used in battle.
name: Gusto di Sahira

description:
A new wine. Greatly restores HP based on its vintage
and buffs ATK, but Curses. Can be used in battle.
name: Leggenda Caduta

description:
A magic painting that takes shape as you imagine it.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Ilsanyan Canvas

description:
Statuette of the Goddess, revered in Gianna and abroad.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: Goddess Icon

description:
A stonecarved curiosity from the Lost City of X.
A souvenir that might be appreciated as a gift.
name: X Relic

description:
A soulgem containing the soul of \N[11].
It shines with a green light.
name: Green Soulgem

description:
Recipe for making Mind Cleansers. Does nothing by
itself, but if you had someone to mix it for you...
name: Mind Cleanser Recipe

description:
Grants the spell "Ice," which deals Ice-element damage
to one enemy and reduces AGI. Magic users only.
name: Ice Tome

description:
Key belonging to the Watchmaker.
Opens locked doors in Urverk.
name: Watchmaker's Key

description:
An invitation to Dama da Vici's wine-tasting party.
This should allow you to go in through the front door.
name: Tasting Gala Invitation

description:
Bottled elemental electricity. Inflicts Overload, or
cures Leak, when used.
name: Bottled Lightning

<Instant>
<Sort Priority: 63>
<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 2142>
<SelectItemFilter:mix>
<Percent Price Variable: 941>

Strange stone that hums with elemental water. Inflicts
Leak, or cures Overload, when used.
name: Rybdis Stone

<Instant>
<Sort Priority: 63>
<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 2141>
<SelectItemFilter:mix>
<Percent Price Variable: 941>

description:
A magic device with a pump. Inflicts Balloon, or cures 
Stiffening, Petrified, or Golem, when used.
name: Inflator

<Sort Priority: 63>
<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 2143>
<SelectItemFilter:mix>
<Percent Price Variable: 941>

description:
A gemstone that beams color with even trace amounts of
light. Inflicts Blessed, or cures Cursed, when used.
name: Goddess Prism

<Instant>
<Sort Priority: 63>
<Shop Hide if All Switches Off: 673, 2144>
<Percent Price Variable: 941>

description:
Grants the forbidden spell "Metamorphosis."
Magic users only.
name: Metamorphosis Tome

description:
A plain-looking key.
Opens the shed in the da Vici Vineyard.
name: Vineyard Key

description:
A silver key.
Seems to match multiple doors within Villa da Vici.
name: Guard Key

description:
A red key emblazoned with an eagle. Looks important.
Used in Villa da Vici, but where...?
name: Eagle Key

description:
A blue key emblazoned with a lion. Looks important.
Used in Villa da Vici, but where...?
name: Lion Key

description:
A collar worn by the Knightess Orc of Tabnath's Arena.
It glows softly with a purple hue...
name: Knightess Collar

description:
Grants the "Grimoire" skill, replacing Spell Attack.
Can only be used by a highly-trained Mage.
name: Grimoire

description:
Grants the special skill "Instruction."
Can only be used by a highly-trained Mage.
name: Instruction Tome

description: A key of solid gold held by a Thyrnir.
name: Golden Key

description:
A Soldier Shell of Urverk that can be folded up and
carried. Inflicts Toy Soldier when used.
name: Portable Shell

description:
Now you can get a tan just like they do on the Seidon
Isles! Greatly raises Lust and may inflict Bimbo.
name: Seidon Tanbulb

description:
For those who don't want to tan. Makes the target
immune to Bimbofying effects for one fight.
name: Seidon Sunscreen

description:
An automated, kit-shaped construct built to upgrade.
Use on a Toy Soldier to level it up, up to LV 3.
name: Upgrade Kit

description:
Use on an ally to Timestop them and fuck them until
they're Defeated. Can use any number of times.
name: Perpetual Stopper

description: A set of clothes, a rifle, and some odd glasses...
name: Assassin Gear

description:
Traditional Valuan method of punishing criminals...
Or just having fun. Inflicts Fellaccia.
name: Criminal Mirror

description:
Use on an ally to inflict Housewife. Can be used any
number of times, but only in the Forest Cabin.
name: Domesticator

description:
A tail piercing that upgrades Fellaccias into
Bodyguard Fellaccias, who can learn combat skills.
name: Bodyguard's Gold

description:
A wine with high alcohol content.
Heals 100 HP and can be used in battle.
name: Fallimento Totale

description:
A note in fine handwriting. "The Memorial Room's twin
sword crests must be moved to enter the guardroom."
name: Security Notice

description:
A key with a tag that simply reads, "Wine Cellar."
It doesn't look like the other Villa da Vici keys...
name: Wine Cellar Key

description:
Grants the spell "Enroll," which inflicts the Student
status. Magic users only.
name: Enroll Tome

description:
An onahole that used to be \N[11].

name: Seidon Onahole

description:
An onahole that used to be \N[11].

name: Seidon Onahole

Grants the spell "Fire," which deals Fire-element
damage to one enemy. Magic users only.
name: Fire Tome

description:
Grants the spell "Smite," which deals Thunder-element
damage to one enemy. Magic users only.
name: Smite Tome

description:
Grants the spell "Torrent," which deals Water-element
damage to one enemy and soaks them. Magic users only.
name: Torrent Tome

description:
Grants the spell "Boulder," which deals physical
damage to one enemy. Magic users only.
name: Boulder Tome

description:
Grants the spell "Gust," which deals Wind-element
damage to one enemy, boosted by PAS. Magic users only.
name: Gust Tome

description:
Grants the spell "Void," which deals high Dark-element
damage to one enemy, costing HP. Magic users only.

Inflicts Petrified, or cures Balloon, when used.

name: Equipment Box

A small chest bearing a golden fox crest.

description:
